Package DAO

Class AppointmentDAO

java.lang.Object
DAO.AppointmentDAO
public class AppointmentDAO extends Object
Data Access Object (DAO) class for managing appointments in the database. This class provides methods to interact with the database to retrieve, add, update, and delete appointments. It also includes methods for retrieving appointment counts by type and month, and appointments associated with specific contacts. Additionally, it contains methods for handling appointment creation, updates, and deletions, along with helper methods for managing contacts and user existence checks. This class encapsulates database interactions related to appointments and facilitates efficient management of appointment data within the application.

    • getAppointmentCountsByTypeAndMonth

      public static List<Map<String,Object>> getAppointmentCountsByTypeAndMonth() throws SQLException
      Retrieves a report of appointment counts by type and month from the database.
      Returns:
      A list containing a map for each row of the report.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If a database error occurs.

    • getAppointmentsByContact

      public static List<Appointment> getAppointmentsByContact(int contactId) throws SQLException
      Retrieves appointments associated with a specific contact from the database.
      Parameters:
      contactId - The ID of the contact.
      Returns:
      A list of appointments associated with the contact.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If a database error occurs.

    • addAppointment

      public static boolean addAppointment(int userId, Appointment appointment)
      Adds a new appointment to the database.
      Parameters:
      userId - The ID of the user creating the appointment.
      appointment - The appointment to add.
      Returns:
      True if the appointment was added successfully, false otherwise.

    • updateAppointment

      public static boolean updateAppointment(int userId, Appointment appointment)
      Updates an existing appointment in the database.
      Parameters:
      userId - The ID of the user updating the appointment.
      appointment - The updated appointment object.
      Returns:
      True if the appointment was updated successfully, false otherwise.
